valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 11 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Faeroes 991 losing its identity. New low expected Viking 987 by 0600 tomorrow

Cyclonic 6 to gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6 for a time.

Occasional rain.
